title: Border Rewards, Ranked Decay
body:
I read in the FAQ section that ranked decay won't happen during pre-season, I am however still getting the "7 days until decay for inactivity" notification when I log in. Is this just unintended and will it just count down and not decay, or has decay not been turned off yet? OR do I have to play 1 ranked game during pre-season to sort of "refresh" the status of my account?

Borders and similar, when do they roll out? I am just curious, not worried.
